channel.title: Help with error!
channel.description:
OK, my server runs fine but every time a player logs in it shows this message in the listener/batch file/command prompt thingy:
[code] Connection from ***-**-**-**-***,*****.***.**.***:**** [client-1-***]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 15 ms] [client-1-***]: Invalid Server: ***********.no-ip.info [client-1-***]: Invalid Server: ***********.no-ip.info [client-1-***]: Invalid Server: ***********.no-ip.info [client-1-***]: Invalid Server: ***********.no-ip.info
[/code]
Can anyone help me with how to fix this? I mean the server works but it does this everytime someone logs in... Please help! -Ghostly150
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**blocked the server ip(so im not advertising) and the players ip address and username(for security reasons)

item.title: Help with error!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:

OK, my server runs fine but every time a player logs in it shows this message in the listener/batch file/command prompt thingy:

Connection from ***-**-**-**-***,*****.***.**.***:****

Can anyone help me with how to fix this? I mean the server works but it does this everytime someone logs inâ€¦ Please help! -Ghostly150

**blocked the server ip(so im not advertising) and the players ip address and username(for security reasons)
